snippet: A Swedish league match between Djurgarden and Mjallby was abandoned after a Mjallby player was hit by a pear.
abstract: Swedish league soccer match between Djurgarden and Mjallby is abandoned after player is hit by debris flung onto field by fan.
lead_paragraph: A Swedish league match between Djurgarden and Mjallby was abandoned after a Mjallby player was hit by a pear.

headline.seo: Flying Fruit Halts Match Between Djurgarden and Mjallby
headline.main: Flying Fruit Halts Match in Sweden
headline.print_headline: Flying Fruit Halts Match in Sweden
